testcase.name: test_user_search_minimum_query_length
testcase.failure: tests/test_visibility_mode_update.py:164: in test_user_search_minimum_query_length assert response.status_code == 200, f"Short query search failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Short query search failed: {"detail":[{"type":"string_too_short","loc":["query","q"],"msg":"String should have at least 2 characters","input":"a","ctx":{"min_length":2},"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/string_too_short"}]} E assert 422 == 200 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
